```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

inspection_df = 
  rest_inspec %>%
  na.omit() %>% 
  separate(inspection_date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") %>%
  filter (year == 2017) 
  
score_per_month = 
  inspection_df %>% 
  na.omit(inspection_df) %>% 
  group_by(month, boro) %>% 
  summarize(score = score)

box_ggplot = 
  ggplot(score_per_month, aes(x = month, y = score, fill = month)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~boro)
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

ggplotly(box_ggplot)
```
